name: folder-icon-crafter
title: Folder Icon Crafter
description: Customize your Finder folders with unique icons using any image you choose. Add style and organization effortlessly!
author: ridemountainpig

commands.name: set-folder-icon
commands.title: Set Folder Icon
commands.description: Quickly set a custom icon for any folder in Finder.

commands.name: reset-folder-icon
commands.title: Reset Folder Icon
commands.description: Reset a folder's icon to the default icon in Finder.

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
